prompt:
You are a senior professor in AI and your students propose to do <combination>.Can you refine the title into a good one that can be accepted by top conferences such as ACL/EMNLP/NeurIPS/ICLR, etc. and list the potential abstract, introduction outline, and section names? 

 Requirements: 1. do not hallucinate, 2. do not use any existing paper names in your pretraining data.
